name: postqi
description: Postqi is a user-friendly project management application built around the Kanban methodology. It was designed with newcomers in mind, making it easy for users to understand and adopt the workflow process.

name: Simple Book API
description: A simple full-stack web application for managing a list of personal book library. Application allows user to add, edit, and delete books from a database.

name: drag'n drop
description: A hands-on project exploring native drag-and-drop, clipboard interactions, image URL validation, and CSS Grid layout.

name: creatacard
description: Implemented new features including video upload and envelope animations for the Creatacard product line. Converted old features from the PureMVC framework to VueJS all while writing component and e2e tests to ensure expected feature behaviors.

name: talking selfies
description: Was responsible for coding the image's transformations to correspond with the mouse and scale slider. Also coded in hand gestures to transform the image on all types of mobile devices. Worked on with two other developers.

name: magical journey
description: Worked with three other programmers and communicated directly with the artist. Worked on converting name particles to base64 string, seamlessly switching between videos, and quality checking the e-card for issues.

name: halloween hidden object game
description: Collaborated with two other programmers and communicated directly with the artist. Responsible for optimizing the spritesheet ands particle effects, adding in animations, and quality checking the game for bugs.

name: flux
description: With a team of seven members, we developed an endless runner game for users to play in an abstract world on their mobile devices. I created and weaved together the game's code with assets created by the team in Unity.

name: peacock
description: Web app allows users sign in, upload an image, and have the app extract prominent colors to create a color palette that can be shared and or liked by other users.
